songs.title: Love Me Harder (Kassiano Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
'Cause if you want to keep me
You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta
Got to love me harder
(Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey...)

[Drop]
Hey, hey
Hey, hey
Hey, hey
Hey, hey

[Chorus]
'Cause if you want to keep me
You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta
Got to love me harder
(Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey...)

[Drop]
Hey, hey
Hey, hey
Hey, hey
Hey, hey
